You can enter the Papi Hills region in two directions: from Kunavaram or from Rajahmundry.

value: (49km). You can hire a boat or join a tour.
also offers boat services to Papi hills. It is well connected by road and rail. The nearest airports are at

A boat trip on the Godavari River in the Papi Hills region is quite spellbinding and romantic. Boat trips are available from

.

You can choose from a wide variety of trips depending on the time limits. Kunavaram offers the fastest and cheapest way to check out the hills.

Tour boats locally called "Launches" are the main transport vehicles. Added to the tour boats the local fishermen's boats can be used for emergency transport.
This region isn't well connected by roads but after a 10km hike, you could reach the main roads of Bhadrachalam to Rajahmundry Ghat road via the village of VR Puram.
The hills cover a forest area where each village on the banks of the Godavari has its stops and individual specialities.

value: Gandipochamma - A temple of GandiPochamma Deity .
content= A major stopover in boat trips, Perantalapalli has Ramakrishna Muni Ashramam and other religious places .
Kolluru - Huts to stay & sands for relaxing atmosphere.
Pamaleru Wagu - A place for bathing in the water which originates from the hills.
content=Offers a place to stay in the night on the sand banks of Godavari River.
content=A somewhat expensive place with additional facilities like a grill, campfire and air conditioning.

This region hardly gets cell phone coverage and is located in the Agency area. Please stick to tourist places and don't miss your boat. It would be very difficult for foreigners who are lost to communicate with the tribal people.
is also worth visitng especially if you are religious.
